snippet: Several Russians accused of illegally exporting microelectronics to Russia have been subjected to “psychological and moral pressure” to admit their guilt, the Russian Foreign Ministry said.
abstract: Russian Foreign Ministry says that several Russians arrested in Texas and accused of illegally exporting microelectronics to Russian military and intelligence agencies have been subjected to 'psychological and moral pressure' to make admissions of guilt.
lead_paragraph: Several Russians accused of illegally exporting microelectronics to Russia have been subjected to “psychological and moral pressure” to admit their guilt, the Russian Foreign Ministry said.

headline.seo: Russia Protests Treatment of Russians Held in Texas
headline.main: Russia Protests Treatment of Russians Arrested in Texas
